- [Liang, F., Paulo, R, Molina, G. Clyde, M, Berger, J](https://www.jstor.org/stable/27640050) (2008) Mixtures of g-priors for Bayesian Variable Selection. Journal of the American Statistical Association,  103: 410-423

  + Section 14.2: Bayesian analysis of the classical regression model
